function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of information dissemination on tuberculosis prevention and control measures","Impact":"Increased risk of tuberculosis transmission and spread","Mitigation":"Enhance education and awareness campaigns on tuberculosis prevention and control measures","Technologies":"Information dissemination platforms such as websites, fact sheets, and online resources","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and individuals with tuberculosis or HIV","Owner":"Health organizations, government health agencies, and public health advocates"},{"Description":"Inadequate infection control in healthcare settings","Impact":"Higher risk of Mycobacterium tuberculosis transmission within healthcare facilities","Mitigation":"Implement strict infection control protocols and guidelines, provide training for healthcare personnel, and ensure proper ventilation and isolation facilities","Technologies":"Air purification systems, negative pressure rooms, and electronic monitoring of infection control practices","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and visitors in healthcare settings","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, infection control specialists, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Limited access to integrated HIV and tuberculosis information","Impact":"Increased risk of uncontrolled spread of HIV and tuberculosis co-infection","Mitigation":"Develop and disseminate comprehensive resources on the interaction between HIV and tuberculosis, improve access to information through multilingual platforms","Technologies":"Online platforms, multilingual information resources, and telemedicine for remote areas","People":"Healthcare providers, individuals with HIV or tuberculosis, and at-risk populations","Owner":"HIV/AIDS organizations, tuberculosis control programs, and global health delivery platforms"}]}
